welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lawrence, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant arts scene, and beautiful outdoor spaces. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Philip Billard Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all freight and cargo shipments at Philip Billard Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Forbes Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Century Aircenter Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at New Century Aircenter Airport provides exclusive services for private jet owners and passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing exclusive amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
